pli-tv-bu-vb-sk34:1.3.1: According to Sp 2.604 this means the bean curries should make up one quarter of the rice: Samasūpako nāma yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti, “Wherever the bean curry is one quarter of the rice is called samasūpaka.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk34:1.14: According to Kkh this means any curries apart from bean curry: Ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṁ avasesā sabbā pi sūpeyyabyañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hoti, “But apart from bean curry, all kinds of curry are called rasarasa.” My translation, however, is based on the fact that all other foods too are excluded.
